title: Quebec Liberal Party
summary: The Quebec Liberal Party (QLP; French: Parti libéral du Québec, PLQ) is a centre-right provincial political party in Quebec.[1][2][3] It has been independent of the federal Liberal Party of Canada since 1955.[4][5][6] The QLP has always been associated with the colour red; each of their main opponents in different eras have been generally associated with the colour blue.[7]
